title: What champions should i get ?
body: Hello all my name is tristan and am getting back into league and was wondering what characters i should get i have 5580 points to spend on champions so what ones should i get btw these are the points you buy with money

replies.body:
What roles do you main?  
Which champs do you have an like?
Who do you not like playing?

Without knowing anything else, just get Soraka and Janna.  They are both easy to play and you'll probably wind up as support sooner or later, so you might as well have some champs that can do the job.

Hey Tristan, welcome back to League!  There is so much diversity in our champion pool that opens up a lot of possibilities for you.  At the end of the day, it's all about who you enjoy most.  You can use the weekly[ free champion rotation](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/free-rotation) to test out new champions, then unlock them if you like!  

Depending on how long you've been gone, you may see some new features!  For example, you can also use the [hextech crafting tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) to rent champions too if you have a shard!  

The decision is ultimately yours!  :D
